scenes.description: Mori Calliope talking to Hakos Baelz on a call during her 3D birthday stream.
Mori Calliope talking to IRyS (who is invisible in the scene).
Mori Calliope talking to Takanashi Kiara on a call with IRyS participating as well.

subtitles.original: I'll learn as well, okay?
subtitles.english: I'll learn as well, okay?

subtitles.original: Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: Oh my god, that'd be so much fun. My heart stopped when I heard Rakuen earlier.
subtitles.english: Oh my god, that'd be so much fun. My heart stopped when I heard Rakuen earlier.

subtitles.original: Oh, see, I thought of you. I thought of you singing that song.
subtitles.english: Oh, see, I thought of you. I thought of you singing that song.

subtitles.original: Yeah, 'cause you know, we're all Inuyasha gang here, so...
subtitles.english: Yeah, 'cause you know, we're all Inuyasha gang here, so...

subtitles.original: Yeah... Yeah, that... that makes me really happy.
subtitles.english: Yeah... Yeah, that... that makes me really happy.

subtitles.original: Well, speaking of songs that I'm doing, what would you...
subtitles.english: Well, speaking of songs that I'm doing, what would you...

subtitles.original: All right, I'm gonna give you the ability to ask me for like a dance move or pose request
subtitles.english: All right, I'm gonna give you the ability to ask me for like a dance move or pose request

subtitles.original: for the next songs that I'm gonna sing. You don't know which songs they are, but...
subtitles.english: for the next songs that I'm gonna sing. You don't know which songs they are, but...

subtitles.original: but I'll insert it. Even if I'm singing a sad slow one, if you want me to do the worm, I'll do it.
subtitles.english: but I'll insert it. Even if I'm singing a sad slow one, if you want me to do the worm, I'll do it.

subtitles.original: Don't choose that, by the way.
subtitles.english: Don't choose that, by the way.

subtitles.original: All right. Um, do you perhaps know... Okay, there's a...
subtitles.english: All right. Um, do you perhaps know... Okay, there's a...

subtitles.original: Okay, I would like to see a pepper grinder move in there.
subtitles.english: Okay, I would like to see a pepper grinder move in there.

subtitles.original: What is that? What's that one?
subtitles.english: What is that? What's that one?

subtitles.original: Okay, so put your two hands in front of you. Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay, so put your two hands in front of you. Okay.

subtitles.original: One... and then pretend you're grinding pepper.
subtitles.english: One... and then pretend you're grinding pepper.

subtitles.original: Yeah! Pepper grinder!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Pepper grinder!

subtitles.original: That's actually... That's pretty cool. Okay, I'll do that.
subtitles.english: That's actually... That's pretty cool. Okay, I'll do that.

subtitles.original: All right, I'll do... I'll do your pepper grinder.
subtitles.english: All right, I'll do... I'll do your pepper grinder.

subtitles.original: Yeah! Do the pepper grinder! And I'd like to see a Holo squat for a song.
subtitles.english: Yeah! Do the pepper grinder! And I'd like to see a Holo squat for a song.

subtitles.original: Squat? Okay, yeah! Whatever you want, Bae! All right, sure, squat! I'll do it for you.
subtitles.english: Squat? Okay, yeah! Whatever you want, Bae! All right, sure, squat! I'll do it for you.

subtitles.original: All right, well I gotta... I gotta get going. You see these eyebags I've got under my eye?
subtitles.english: All right, well I gotta... I gotta get going. You see these eyebags I've got under my eye?

subtitles.original: They're from you. But I love you very much.
subtitles.english: They're from you. But I love you very much.

subtitles.original: I love you too! Happy Birthday, Calli!
subtitles.english: I love you too! Happy Birthday, Calli!

subtitles.original: Thank you for the birthday wishes! You're the best, Bae!
subtitles.english: Thank you for the birthday wishes! You're the best, Bae!

subtitles.original: You're the best! I'll talk to you later!
subtitles.english: You're the best! I'll talk to you later!

subtitles.original: Love you! Bye-bye! Bye, Bae!
subtitles.english: Love you! Bye-bye! Bye, Bae!

subtitles.original: Bye, Bae! Bye, Bae! Why are you still there?
subtitles.english: Bye, Bae! Bye, Bae! Why are you still there?

subtitles.original: Bye! I'm still here! Bye, Bae!
subtitles.english: Bye! I'm still here! Bye, Bae!

subtitles.original: There we go, that was... that was Bae. Bae gave me a call on my birthday. Wasn't that sweet? Wasn't it sweet, IRyS?
subtitles.english: There we go, that was... that was Bae. Bae gave me a call on my birthday. Wasn't that sweet? Wasn't it sweet, IRyS?

subtitles.original: Yeah! It was very sweet. Sorry, I'm... I'm probably either in the ground or invisible right now.
subtitles.english: Yeah! It was very sweet. Sorry, I'm... I'm probably either in the ground or invisible right now.

subtitles.original: It's okay. She's become a ghost, but she's still among us.
subtitles.english: It's okay. She's become a ghost, but she's still among us.

subtitles.original: Don't... Chat, never mind. All right, well I wonder if somebody else will call.
subtitles.english: Don't... Chat, never mind. All right, well I wonder if somebody else will call.

subtitles.original: ほ、他の誰か電話するかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if someone else will call?

subtitles.original: 誰が電話するのかなー？
subtitles.english: I wonder who's calling?

subtitles.original: Oh my gosh, someone's calling! Someone's calling! Someone's calling! All right, let's go pick up the phone again! Let's see what happens!
subtitles.english: Oh my gosh, someone's calling! Someone's calling! Someone's calling! All right, let's go pick up the phone again! Let's see what happens!

subtitles.original: I got it! Oh, it worked!
subtitles.english: I got it! Oh, it worked!

subtitles.original: もしもし！ Kitty, Kitty, もしもし！
subtitles.english: Hello! Kitty, Kitty, hello!

subtitles.original: It's Wawa! Kiara! Wawa's here!
subtitles.english: It's Wawa! Kiara! Wawa's here!

subtitles.original: Hello! What's up? You've got like a super special themed karaoke room!
subtitles.english: Hello! What's up? You've got like a super special themed karaoke room!

subtitles.original: I do! I wanted to do something special this year, you know?
subtitles.english: I do! I wanted to do something special this year, you know?

subtitles.original: Oh my god, what... eh? But it's like... normally you get these super boring karaoke rooms if you go to karaoke.
subtitles.english: Oh my god, what... eh? But it's like... normally you get these super boring karaoke rooms if you go to karaoke.

subtitles.original: You gotta pay extra for the special ones. So how much did you pay for this special one?
subtitles.english: You gotta pay extra for the special ones. So how much did you pay for this special one?

subtitles.original: You don't want to know, Kiara. You don't want to know how much I paid. But you know what? I'm happy.
subtitles.english: You don't want to know, Kiara. You don't want to know how much I paid. But you know what? I'm happy.

subtitles.original: Twelve bits! Sometimes you gotta treat yourself to something nice!
subtitles.english: Twelve bits! Sometimes you gotta treat yourself to something nice!

subtitles.original: That's true, that's true. You know what, that's... that's the spice of life, honestly, that I get to do this kind of stuff.
subtitles.english: That's true, that's true. You know what, that's... that's the spice of life, honestly, that I get to do this kind of stuff.

subtitles.original: I'm really happy, I'm lucky, you know?
subtitles.english: I'm really happy, I'm lucky, you know?

subtitles.original: Yay! Happy Birthday, Kewie!
subtitles.english: Yay! Happy Birthday, Kewie!

subtitles.original: Thanks so much, Kiwawa! I appreciate you calling in to wish me a happy birthday.
subtitles.english: Thanks so much, Kiwawa! I appreciate you calling in to wish me a happy birthday.

subtitles.original: I gotta wish you a happy birthday too! I have it in my calendar.
subtitles.english: I gotta wish you a happy birthday too! I have it in my calendar.

subtitles.original: Oh, yeah, thank you! Well, it's still a long time to go... but I was so surprised when I realized...
subtitles.english: Oh, yeah, thank you! Well, it's still a long time to go... but I was so surprised when I realized...

subtitles.original: wait, what? Calli's birthday already? Now? What? It felt like just yesterday when you had your last one.
subtitles.english: wait, what? Calli's birthday already? Now? What? It felt like just yesterday when you had your last one.

subtitles.original: I know! Time really flies. Well, I'm gonna eat lots and lots of KFP on your birthday.
subtitles.english: I know! Time really flies. Well, I'm gonna eat lots and lots of KFP on your birthday.

subtitles.original: Nom nom nom nom...
subtitles.english: Nom nom nom nom...

subtitles.original: I have a question! But I would prefer... like a... a cake that looks like fried chicken, but it's actually a cake.
subtitles.english: I have a question! But I would prefer... like a... a cake that looks like fried chicken, but it's actually a cake.

subtitles.original: You know those fake cakes? That is a real thing. People do know how to do that. Yeah, that's crazy.
subtitles.english: You know those fake cakes? That is a real thing. People do know how to do that. Yeah, that's crazy.

subtitles.original: Well, I have a question for you, Wawa. What do you want to see me do this year?
subtitles.english: Well, I have a question for you, Wawa. What do you want to see me do this year?

subtitles.original: This year in general? Yeah, don't say 'take a break' because Bae said 'take a break'.
subtitles.english: This year in general? Yeah, don't say 'take a break' because Bae said 'take a break'.

subtitles.original: I want you to realize some plans that you have on the... you know, what do you call it? Backburner?
subtitles.english: I want you to realize some plans that you have on the... you know, what do you call it? Backburner?

subtitles.original: Or like, not backburner, I don't know, but... Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Or like, not backburner, I don't know, but... Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: Plans that you have had since like maybe a year or so.
subtitles.english: Plans that you have had since like maybe a year or so.

subtitles.original: And just make them a reality this year. You know what I mean?
subtitles.english: And just make them a reality this year. You know what I mean?

subtitles.original: I know what you... I think I know what you mean. Definitely. Wink wink, wonk wonk.
subtitles.english: I know what you... I think I know what you mean. Definitely. Wink wink, wonk wonk.

subtitles.original: Wink wink, wonk wonk! I like that idea. Okay, well you've inspired me now, Kiara. Okay, I'll do it! I'll do it!
subtitles.english: Wink wink, wonk wonk! I like that idea. Okay, well you've inspired me now, Kiara. Okay, I'll do it! I'll do it!

subtitles.original: Okay! Just do it! Just do it! Can you give me like, with the hand poses, like, you know,
subtitles.english: Okay! Just do it! Just do it! Can you give me like, with the hand poses, like, you know,

subtitles.original: walking around and then with the finger onto the hand?
subtitles.english: walking around and then with the finger onto the hand?

subtitles.original: Just... Oh, yeah, wait, hold on. The finger onto the hand? Yeah, maybe you can't take the props off, that's okay.
subtitles.english: Just... Oh, yeah, wait, hold on. The finger onto the hand? Yeah, maybe you can't take the props off, that's okay.

subtitles.original: Just do it! Don't let your dreams be dreams! Do it!
subtitles.english: Just do it! Don't let your dreams be dreams! Do it!

subtitles.original: Do it! Something like that. Yeah! I'll do it too! I'll do whatever!
subtitles.english: Do it! Something like that. Yeah! I'll do it too! I'll do whatever!

subtitles.original: You should do it too! Hey, also, you get a request for the next song that I'm singing.
subtitles.english: You should do it too! Hey, also, you get a request for the next song that I'm singing.

subtitles.original: What kind of like dance move or pose do you want to see me do?
subtitles.english: What kind of like dance move or pose do you want to see me do?

subtitles.original: What kind of like dance move or pose do you want to see me do?
subtitles.english: What kind of like dance move or pose do you want to see me do?

subtitles.original: Do you know like roughly what the vogue dance style is?
subtitles.english: Do you know like roughly what the vogue dance style is?

subtitles.original: Um, can you give me an example? Vogue?
subtitles.english: Um, can you give me an example? Vogue?

subtitles.original: I think... Oh, hi IRyS! That's the first word I hear!
subtitles.english: I think... Oh, hi IRyS! That's the first word I hear!

subtitles.original: I said hi, Kiara! I was like, 'Hi Kiara!'. I'm here, I'm invisible!
subtitles.english: I said hi, Kiara! I was like, 'Hi Kiara!'. I'm here, I'm invisible!

subtitles.original: IRyS, you can vogue too! Do you know how to vogue?
subtitles.english: IRyS, you can vogue too! Do you know how to vogue?

subtitles.original: What is that? What is that? You don't know? Well, it's like...
subtitles.english: What is that? What is that? You don't know? Well, it's like...
